description: The current drop-in sessions to see an audiologist will be replaced with an appointment-only system.
title: Appointment system to replace drop-in sessions for Manx hearing aid patients
title_page: Appointment system to replace drop-in sessions for Manx hearing aid patients - BBC News
maintext: Dr Griffiths said: "Demand for device maintenance is growing and as a result we have days when the drop-in clinics are quiet while at other times the waiting room is bursting at the seams."
